lines.text: I'm not going to take advice from someone who broke their neck trying to suck their own dick.
How come you guys always make that noise?
[Peter hocks up some phlegm and spits]
I mean you guys spit so much, it kind of makes you wonder what you've be sucking on.

My grandfather was right. I now know in my heart of hearts that people are supposed to make love. It is their main purpose in life. All those other activities - playing the violin, washing dishes, reading novels, drinking wine - are just ways of passing time, until you can make love again.
Erica. It sounds just like "Erotica." Suits her too. The girl's a walking wet dream.
